Module com.cse.ai.othellogame
Package com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.resultscreen

Class ResultScreen

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.resultscreen.ResultScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ResultScreen extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ResultScreen class represents the screen displayed after the game ends. It shows the final scores, winner or tie message, and provides options to restart the game, return to the main menu, or exit the application.
